title: Redemption
description: Bryce Galloway has followed the rules of the High Vampire Council long enough. After wolves were sent to drag him and his vampire mate, Victoria Day, back to London, it’s time to repay the Council for one hundred and fifty years of torture. Gathering the members of The Blood Clan together, a plan is set in motion to put this reign of terror to an end. The Ancient vampire, Averill, has waited five hundred years to have Bryce by her side, and now, as the full moon draws closer, his blood calls to her louder than before. Torn between obsessive love and a need for revenge, Averill will stop at nothing to get what she wants, and make Bryce her servant— for eternity.In this game of power, no one is safe. It’s time to reclaim the throne.
author: Kat  Daemon
